summary: The married friends of a New York chorus girl encourage her to pursue a handsome but poor socialite.
cast: Marion Davies|Lawrence Gray|Walter Catlett|Louis John Bartels|Ilka Chase|Vivien Oakland|Jed Prouty|Claud Allister|Sam Hardy|Nance O'Neil|Robert Bolder|Jane Keithley|Maude Turner Gordon|George Chandler|Anita Louise|Mary Jane Irving|Jack Baxley|Lenore Bushman|Patricia Caron|Lee Phelps|Ethel Sykes|Leo White
title: The Florodora Girl
